entry.title: Keto Revel-ution Bars
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 250.00

Join our sugar-free revolution with our new Keto Revel-ution Bars! A best-loved bakery favorite, and one of our most demanded treats; we did the impossible and made a keto-friendly, sugar-free revel bar that we think is even better than its sugary counterpart. Made from an all-nut batter and topped a thick river of real chocolate, this is one revolution that’s already won.

Keto Revel-ution Bars

Box of 4

Php 250

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

Shelf Life 7 days, refrigerated.
Storage Instructions
Store in airtight container, refrigerated.
Heating Instructions
Microwave 15 secs on medium high heat.

entry.title: Keto Vegetarian Pizza
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Savory
Price: 500.00

You craved it, so we baked it!

Delivered fresh to your door, never frozen! Imagine a grain-free crust made from mozzarella cheese, topped with shiitaki and oyster mushrooms, olives, jalapenos, and sun-dried tomatoes coming together in a meat-free, savoury, keto pizza that's flavor-heavy yet tummy light. 

  • 100% Keto Approved
  • Sugar-Free
  • Low Carb

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

HEATING INSTRUCTIONS:

Once received, kindly store your baked goods in the refrigerator overnight and enjoy!  For a bakery-fresh experience, reheat in your oven toaster or microwave on high for 15 seconds, and enjoy.

entry.title: Giant Cinnamon Roll
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 650.00

"Wow!" your guests and fill the air with the smell of warm cinnamon this holiday season. Share a slice or two of this soft fluffy dough filled with sugar-free cinnamon sugar & freshly crushed walnuts, topped with rich cream cheese frosting and sliced almonds.

Sugar-Free Giant Cinnamon Roll
Php 650 for 6 servings
1 pc Giant Cinnamon Roll
1 pc 50g Sugar-Free Cream Cheese Frosting

Best consumed immediately.

Shelf Life
Bread - 3 days at room temperature.
Frosting - 3 days refrigerated.
Storage Instructions
Bread & Frosting - Store in airtight container, refrigerated.
Heating Instructions
Bread - Microwave 15-30 secs on medium high heat.
Frosting - From the refrigerated storage, microwave container for 10-15 seconds at medium high heat.

 

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

Multiple Address Delivery & Bulk Order
For 2 or more delivery addresses (with a minimum spend of PHP 2,000), send us an email at thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com to receive our multiple address form.

Special Delivery Requests

For special delivery requests outside of our regular delivery schedule (Sunday-Saturday, 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM), additional fees may apply. Kindly send your inquiries at 0917 705 5876 or thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com.

entry.title: Vegan Matcha Milk Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 180.00

Yes, we've made our milk teas not only sugar-free but also vegan! Take a sip of this creamy milk tea with a delicate & earthy taste without the sugar.

This product is:

  • low-carb
  • sugar-free
  • 100% natural
  • diabetic-friendly
  • and even keto-friendly


Sugar-Free Vegan Matcha Milk Tea
500 ml for Php 180 

Best consumed immediately.

Shelf Life 1 day, refrigerated.
Storage Instructions
3 days, refrigerated. Consume immediately once opened.
Serving Instructions
Shake well and serve chilled.

 

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

entry.title: Filipino Cheese Roll
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 350.00

Take a break and bite into the goodness of our Sugar-Free Filipino Cheese Roll.

Enjoy the sweetness without the sugar as you sink your teeth into the soft & fluffy cheese roll with velvety cheese filling. Pair with your fave cup of barako for an afternoon pickup.

These cheese rolls are absolutely:

  • Sugar-free
  • Diabetic-friendly

Sugar-Free Filipino Cheese Roll
Php 350  for box of 6

Best consumed immediately.

Shelf Life
3 days, refrigerated.
Storage Instructions
Store in airtight container, refrigerated.
Heating Instructions
Preheat oven to 100 degrees celsius for 3 mins, heat the product for 7 mins at 100 degrees celsius.

entry.title: Seriously Sugar-Free Thai Milk Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Beverage
Price: 160.00

kSAWADEEKA!

Sip Sweetly, But Nothing Sugary!

Have a TEA-rrific day! ✨

We bet everyone's excited about our Sugar-Free Thai Milk Tea! Take a sip and enjoy its bold, creamy, aromatic, and sweet taste of freshly brewed Cha Yen without the sugar.

Now brewing and ready for orders!

 Delivered direct to your door, it’s:

  • Sugar-Free
  • Gluten-Free
  • Keto-Approved
  • Diabetic-Friendly
  • Low Carb

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

CHILLING INSTRUCTIONS:

Once received, chill your Sugar-Free Milk Tea in the refrigerator, shake well and consume immediately.

entry.title: Seriously Sugar-Free Milk Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Beverage
Price: 160.00

Sip Sweetly, But Nothing Sugary!

That’s right! We have our Seriously Sugar-free Milktea that you can enjoy, sinkers, toppers, and all!!!

For anyone who’s ever loved the refreshing, creamy sweetness of an ice-cold milktea with their favorite choice of add-ons, can now love it all the more knowing that it’s sugar-free!

Delivered direct to your door, it’s:

  • low-carb
  • gluten-free
  • 100% natural
  • diabetic-friendly
  • and even keto-friendly

Seriously, this could be the fittest milk tea you’ve ever had. So don’t just sip there… pre-order now.

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

CHILLING INSTRUCTIONS:

Once received, chill your Sugar-Free Milk Tea in the refrigerator, shake well and consume immediately.
